languages.text: "Я знала, что вы оцените, шерин". {n}Джай громко хлопает в ладоши, и зверь с плотоядным интересом оборачивает на громкий звук.{/n} "Думаю, возле вашего трона она будет смотреться наилучшим образом".

"I knew you would approve, shereen." {n}Jae claps her hands loudly and the animal whips around at the noise with predatory interest.{/n} "I think she will be shown off to her best advantage next to your throne."
languages.original_text: "Я знала, что вы оцените, шерин". {n}Джай громко хлопает в ладоши, и зверь с плотоядным интересом оборачивает на громкий звук.{/n} "Думаю, возле вашего трона она будет смотреться наилучшим образом".

traits.locale_text: "I knew you would approve, shereen." {n}Jae claps her hands loudly and the animal whips around at the noise with predatory interest.{/n} "I think she will be shown off to her best advantage next to your throne."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我就知道你会喜欢，亲爱的。”{n}婕伊大声鼓着掌。那头异虎听到声音之后，也带着掠食者的兴趣，靠了过来。{/n}“我觉得她最好呆在你的王座旁边，这样一来，所有人都能看得到她。”
languages.original_text: "I knew you would approve, shereen." {n}Jae claps her hands loudly and the animal whips around at the noise with predatory interest.{/n} "I think she will be shown off to her best advantage next to your throne."

traits.locale_text: “我就知道你会喜欢，亲爱的。”{n}婕伊大声鼓着掌。那头异虎听到声音之后，也带着掠食者的兴趣，靠了过来。{/n}“我觉得她最好呆在你的王座旁边，这样一来，所有人都能看得到她。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あんたなら認めてくれると思ってたよ、シャリーン」{n}ジェイが大きく手を叩くと、動物が捕食者のようにその音に振り向いた。{/n}「あんたの玉座の隣で、その魅力を存分に発揮してくれることでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I knew you would approve, shereen." {n}Jae claps her hands loudly and the animal whips around at the noise with predatory interest.{/n} "I think she will be shown off to her best advantage next to your throne."

traits.locale_text: 「あんたなら認めてくれると思ってたよ、シャリーン」{n}ジェイが大きく手を叩くと、動物が捕食者のようにその音に振り向いた。{/n}「あんたの玉座の隣で、その魅力を存分に発揮してくれることでしょう」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Sabía que le gustaría, shereen». {n}Jae aplaude sonoramente y la bestia se gira hacia ella con interés depredador.{/n} «Creo que el lugar ideal estará junto a su trono».
languages.original_text: "I knew you would approve, shereen." {n}Jae claps her hands loudly and the animal whips around at the noise with predatory interest.{/n} "I think she will be shown off to her best advantage next to your throne."

traits.locale_text: «Sabía que le gustaría, shereen». {n}Jae aplaude sonoramente y la bestia se gira hacia ella con interés depredador.{/n} «Creo que el lugar ideal estará junto a su trono».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je savais que mon cadeau vous plairait, shereen. » {n}Jae applaudit bruyamment et l'animal se retourne d'un bond avec un intérêt carnassier.{/n} « Je crois qu'elle sera du plus bel effet assise à côté de votre trône. »
languages.original_text: "I knew you would approve, shereen." {n}Jae claps her hands loudly and the animal whips around at the noise with predatory interest.{/n} "I think she will be shown off to her best advantage next to your throne."

traits.locale_text: « Je savais que mon cadeau vous plairait, shereen. » {n}Jae applaudit bruyamment et l'animal se retourne d'un bond avec un intérêt carnassier.{/n} « Je crois qu'elle sera du plus bel effet assise à côté de votre trône. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich wusste, dass sie Euch gefallen würde, Shereen." {n}Jae klatscht laut in die Hände und das Tier schnellt bei dem Geräusch mit lauernder Aufmerksamkeit herum.{/n} "Ich glaube, direkt neben Eurem Thron wird sie am besten zur Geltung kommen."
languages.original_text: "I knew you would approve, shereen." {n}Jae claps her hands loudly and the animal whips around at the noise with predatory interest.{/n} "I think she will be shown off to her best advantage next to your throne."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wusste, dass sie Euch gefallen würde, Shereen." {n}Jae klatscht laut in die Hände und das Tier schnellt bei dem Geräusch mit lauernder Aufmerksamkeit herum.{/n} "Ich glaube, direkt neben Eurem Thron wird sie am besten zur Geltung kommen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Onaylayacağını biliyordum şirinim." {n}Jae'ın yüksek sesle ellerini çırpması üzerine hayvan, yırtıcı niyetlerle sese tepki veriyor.{/n} "Sanırım onun için en mantıklısı, tahtının yanında sergilenmek olacak."
languages.original_text: "I knew you would approve, shereen." {n}Jae claps her hands loudly and the animal whips around at the noise with predatory interest.{/n} "I think she will be shown off to her best advantage next to your throne."

traits.locale_text: "Onaylayacağını biliyordum şirinim." {n}Jae yüksek sesle ellerini çırpıyor ve hayvan, yırtıcı niyetlerle sese doğru tepki veriyor.{/n} "Sanırım onun için en mantıklısı, tahtının yanında sergilenmek olacak."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
